version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select from ecm_artwork_version_info
and version_id like CONCAT('%',#{versionId},'%')
and remarks like CONCAT('%',#{remarks},'%')
and play_client = #{playClient}

select COUNT(*) from ecm_artwork_version_info
and version_id like CONCAT('%',#{versionId},'%')
and remarks like CONCAT('%',#{remarks},'%')
and play_client = #{playClient}
group by version_id
select from ecm_artwork_version_info where version_id = #{versionId} and fk_artwork_id is not null
select from ecm_artwork_version_info where version_id = #{versionId} and fk_artwork_id is null
